import React, { useState } from 'react' const NewUser = () => { const [User, setUser]=useState({ name:"",email:"",uname:"",pass:"" }); const [Pic, setPic]=useState(); const getData=(ev)=>{ let name=ev.target.name; let value=ev.target.value; setUser({...User,[name]:value}) } return ( <>

{}} value={Pic} className='form-control'>

) } export default NewUser
